p: In the present study, the body weight and organ coefficient of the MOL‚Äêtreated mice remained unchanged, which demonstrated that MOL dose is safe in animal application. The levels of serum hormones play an important role for the sexual capacity of mammals. In present study, MOL had no significant effects on the serum testosterone concentration in male nor on the serum estradiol concentration in female mice. Similar results have been reported by Cajuday and Pocsidio ( 2010) who fed male mice with a hexane extract of MOL.
